Title: Illuminated Finispiece with Final Prayer
Medium: ink and pigments on laid European paper
Description: This illuminated finispiece from Walters manuscript W.743 is inscribed with a prayer to be recited after the last chapter of the Qur'an.
Keywords: Koran; Qur`an; Arabic; Islamic; Ottoman; Turkish; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Illumination; Manuscript; Contemporary Binding; Turkey; Scripture
Provenance: Robert L. Fox [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1990, by gift.
Creator: Muhammad Salih ibn 'Umar
